attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Again, this morning, Gordon McBroon was in America telling everybody he is going to buy 20 million mosquito nets for Africa.  This man has to be stopped.  At this rate of give away he will bankrupt this country AND ALL IN HIS VAIN ATTEMPT TO GAIN WORLD STATESMAN STATUS.

NOT AT MY EXPENSE PLEASE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
